personalInfo.name: Dharmendiran E
personalInfo.title: Automation & QA Engineer
personalInfo.bio: Crafting robust and scalable automation frameworks to ensure software quality and accelerate development cycles. Passionate about building reliable tests and streamlining CI/CD pipelines for faster, more efficient releases.

about: Hello! I'm Dharmendiran E – an experienced Automation Engineer with 3 years of hands-on expertise in building scalable automation solutions for web, mobile, and API testing. I specialize in Python, Selenium, Robot Framework, Appium, and BDD practices using Gherkin and Cucumber.

I’m skilled in integrating automation into CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, performing API testing with Postman, and using SQL for backend validation. I also have practical experience automating AWS services using Boto3, including Lambda, S3, and Redshift.

With a strong foundation in Agile Scrum methodologies, I collaborate effectively using tools like JIRA, Zephyr, and Confluence. I'm also the creator of a GenAI-powered BDD Test Scenario Generator that integrates Confluence design docs with Amazon Bedrock—accelerating test creation and improving alignment with business needs.

description: Developed and maintained automation test scripts using Python, Selenium, and Robot Framework.
Automated Android application testing using Appium to ensure smooth mobile app performance.
Designed and implemented BDD test cases using Gherkin and Cucumber for better collaboration and clarity.
Developed and integrated test automation scripts into Jenkins CI/CD pipelines for continuous testing and deployment.
Conducted API testing using Postman, validating request-response structures, status codes, and performance.
Wrote and optimized SQL queries for database validation as part of end-to-end testing.
Automated AWS services using Boto3, including Lambda, S3, and Redshift, for cloud-based test automation.
Worked in Agile environments following Scrum methodologies, and used JIRA, Zephyr, and Confluence for test management, reporting, and documentation.

Developed a GenAI-powered BDD Test Scenario Generator that integrates Confluence design documents with Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Bases, leveraging foundation models to auto-generate Gherkin-style test scenarios for improved test coverage and efficiency.

projects.title: GenAI BDD Test Scenario Generator
projects.description: Creator of a GenAI-powered tool that integrates Confluence design documents with Amazon Bedrock to auto-generate Gherkin-style BDD test scenarios, significantly improving test coverage and efficiency.

projects.title: E-Commerce Test Automation Framework
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive UI and API test automation framework using Python, Selenium, and Pytest for a high-traffic e-commerce platform. Integrated with Jenkins for nightly regression runs.

projects.title: SaaS Application End-to-End Testing
projects.description: Led the implementation of an end-to-end testing suite for a complex SaaS product using Cypress. Focused on critical user workflows and cross-browser compatibility, reducing bug leakage by 40%.

certifications.name: Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Scientist Associate
